title: Frank Lloyd Wright Coaster Set—Hoffman
description:
Cut condensation from your life. Be permanently prepared for company with these absorbent ceramic stone coasters. Printed with a pattern Frank Lloyd Wright® (American, 1867–1959) created for a rug in the Max Hoffman House. Due to the nature of the stone and heat transfer process, slight imperfections may occur. 

Each set includes four 4 ¼ in. diam. coasters
